咷字的基本解释

咷
táo
同“啕”。

咷字的汉语字典释义

[①]［táo］
［《廣韻》徒刀切，平豪，定。］
(1)大哭。
(2)助词。
[②]［tiào］
［《廣韻》他弔切，去嘯，透。］
见“噭咷”。

咷字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　咷； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页187第15
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?徒刀切，音濤。【說文】楚謂兒泣不止曰噭咷。又【易·同人】九五，同人先號咷而後笑。　又【集韻】他弔切，音糶。義同。　又亭歷切，音狄。【前漢·韓延壽傳】歌者先居射室，望見延壽車，噭咷楚歌。【註】咷音滌濯之滌。

咷字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
咷字的起名意思

暂无。

咷
Basic explanation of words
咷
táo
Same as "啕".
咷
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［táo］
["Guangyun" cuts with a knife, Pinghao, Ding. ]
(1) Cry loudly.
(2) Auxiliary words.
[②]［tiào］
["Guangyun" he hangs and cuts, screams, and penetrates. ]
See "Boyong".
咷
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　咷; Kangxi strokes: 9; Page number: page 187 15
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme] [Zheng Yun]? Cut with a knife, sound waves. [Said the text] Chu said that the child cried more than just saying 噭咷. Also 【Yi·Tongren】Nine-five, the doujin first shouts and then laughs.　[Jiyun] He hangs and cuts, and the sound is 粜. The same meaning.　You Ting Liqie, Yin Di. [Previous Han·Han Yanshou Biography] The singer first lived in the shooting room and saw the Yanshou car. [Note] The sound of the sound dilutes the dilute.
